441260.name: Deathsmiles OST
441260.description:
Includes 23 audio tracks in mp3 and flac (lossless).

Composed & Mixed by Manabu Namiki (Basiscape)
Lead Guitar Performed by Noriyuki Kamikura (Basiscape) (tracks 2, 5, 7-9, 11, and 13)
Mastered by Masaaki Kaneko (Basiscape)

Track 14
Composition: J.S. Bach

Track 16
Composition: Takayuki Hirose (広瀬隆之)
Vocal: Takayuki Hirose
Lyrics: Takayuki Hirose

Track 17
Composition: Natsuko Naitou
Vocal: Natsuko Naitou
Lyrics: Natsuko Naitou
Recording Engineer: Ryoji Uezu
Sound Director: Daisuke Matsumoto, Yukihiro Masaki

Voice Actors
Windia: Naomi Iida (CARROT HOUSE)
Casper: Miho Hayashi (AS kikaku)
Follett: Rumi Abe (AS kikaku)
Rosa: Natsuko Tauchi (AS kikaku)
Sakura: Kaori Nakamura (AS kikaku)
Jitterbug: Junya Inoue
441260.supported_languages:
英语, 日语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
